chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:

base_fst: BaseParams
multi_fst: MultiParams base_fst
multi_snd: MultiParams base_snd
base_map: BaseParamsTotalMap base_fst base_snd
name_map: MultiParamsNameTotalMap multi_fst multi_snd
msg_map: MultiParamsMsgTotalMap multi_fst multi_snd
name_map_bijective: MultiParamsNameTotalMapBijective name_map
multi_map_congr: MultiParamsTotalMapCongruency base_map name_map msg_map
tot_map_output_injective: forall o o' : output, tot_map_output o = tot_map_output o' -> o = o'
fail_fst: FailureParams multi_fst
fail_snd: FailureParams multi_snd
fail_map_congr: FailureParamsTotalMapCongruency fail_fst fail_snd base_map
overlay_fst: NameOverlayParams multi_fst
overlay_snd: NameOverlayParams multi_snd
overlay_map_congr: NameOverlayParamsTotalMapCongruency overlay_fst overlay_snd name_map
fail_msg_fst: FailMsgParams multi_fst
fail_msg_snd: FailMsgParams multi_snd
fail_msg_map_congr: FailMsgParamsTotalMapCongruency fail_msg_fst fail_msg_snd msg_map
new_msg_fst: NewMsgParams multi_fst
new_msg_snd: NewMsgParams multi_snd
new_msg_map_congr: NewMsgParamsTotalMapCongruency new_msg_fst new_msg_snd msg_map

Goal:
forall (net : ordered_dynamic_network) (failed : list name) (tr : list (name * (input + output))), step_ordered_dynamic_failure_star step_ordered_dynamic_failure_init (failed, net) tr -> step_ordered_dynamic_failure_star step_ordered_dynamic_failure_init (map tot_map_name failed, tot_map_odnet net) (map tot_map_trace tr)

tot_map_odnet = fun net : ordered_dynamic_network => {| odnwNodes := map tot_map_name (odnwNodes net); odnwPackets := fun src dst : name => map tot_map_msg (odnwPackets net (tot_map_name_inv src) (tot_map_name_inv dst)); odnwState := fun n : name => match odnwState net (tot_map_name_inv n) with | Some d => Some (tot_map_data d) | None => None end |} : ordered_dynamic_network -> ordered_dynamic_network
Record FailMsgParams (P0 : BaseParams) (P : MultiParams P0) : Type := Build_FailMsgParams { msg_fail : msg } Arguments FailMsgParams {P0} Arguments Build_FailMsgParams [P0]
Record BaseParams : Type := Build_BaseParams { data : Type; input : Type; output : Type } Arguments Build_BaseParams (_ _ _)%type_scope

MultiParamsNameTotalMap : forall B0 B1 : BaseParams, MultiParams B0 -> MultiParams B1 -> Type
Record NewMsgParams (P0 : BaseParams) (P : MultiParams P0) : Type := Build_NewMsgParams { msg_new : msg } Arguments NewMsgParams {P0} Arguments Build_NewMsgParams [P0]
Record FailureParams (P0 : BaseParams) (P : MultiParams P0) : Type := Build_FailureParams { reboot : data -> data } Arguments FailureParams {P0} Arguments Build_FailureParams [P0] _ _%function_scope
name = fun (P : BaseParams) (MultiParams0 : MultiParams P) => let (name, msg, _, _, nodes, _, _, _, _, _) := MultiParams0 in name : forall P : BaseParams, MultiParams P -> Type Arguments name {P MultiParams}

Inductive list (A : Type) : Type := nil : list A | cons : A -> list A -> list A Arguments list _%type_scope Arguments nil {A}%type_scope Arguments cons {A}%type_scope a l%list_scope : rename

FailureParamsTotalMapCongruency : forall (B0 B1 : BaseParams) (P0 : MultiParams B0) (P1 : MultiParams B1), FailureParams P0 -> FailureParams P1 -> BaseParamsTotalMap B0 B1 -> Prop
MultiParamsTotalMapCongruency : forall (B0 B1 : BaseParams) (P0 : MultiParams B0) (P1 : MultiParams B1), BaseParamsTotalMap B0 B1 -> MultiParamsNameTotalMap P0 P1 -> MultiParamsMsgTotalMap P0 P1 -> Prop
Record ordered_dynamic_network (P : BaseParams) (multi_params : MultiParams P) : Type := mkODNetwork { odnwNodes : list name; odnwPackets : name -> name -> list msg; odnwState : name -> option data } Arguments ordered_dynamic_network {P multi_params} Arguments mkODNetwork {P multi_params} _%list_scope (_ _)%function_scope

``` 
intros net failed tr H.
induction H.
- apply refl_trans_1n_trace_refl.
- apply refl_trans_1n_trace_trans with (map tot_map_name failed, tot_map_odnet net).
  + apply step_ordered_dynamic_failure_tot_mapped_simulation_1; auto.
  + apply IHrefl_trans_1n_trace.
```
